name: MEC Soft Synthetic Mummy Liner - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Easier to wash than your sleeping bag. Slide this quick drying liner inside your bag to keep odour and sweat from penetrating. Adds a little bit of warmth but mostly just keeps your sleeping bag clean.Made of lightweight polyester knit with a brushed, soft finish.Tapered shape is designed to work inside (you guessed it) mummy shaped sleeping bags.Includes an integrated stuff sack.Available in Small, Regular and Long to work with corresponding MEC sleeping bags.

        Sustainability
